clothes.title: COLLUSION Plus check blazer with print
clothes.product_details:
Plus-size **blazer** by *COLLUSION*
-   Add-to-bag potential: considerable
-   Shawl lapels
-   Check design
-   Button closure
-   Text print to cuffs
-   Regular fit
-   Just select your usual size
clothes.brand: A new brand for the coming-of-age generation that refuses to compromise on principle or style, *COLLUSION* believes clothes that celebrate self-expression and inclusivity should be the norm. It’s no surprise then that it’s linked up with six inspirational creatives to shape its first collection, which includes denim, knitwear, dresses and loads more.
clothes.size_n_fit:

Model's height: 176cm/5'9.5"

clothes.about_me:

The kind that doesn't stretch
Main: 100% Polyester.

clothes.title: Only Petite faux fur jacket in sand
clothes.product_details:
**Petite coat**  by  *Only*
-   Go with the faux
-   Wide lapels
-   Press-stud fastening
-   Functional pockets
-   Regular fit
-   Just select your usual size
clothes.brand: Let’s be honest, we all love a bit of Scandi style. That’s why we’ve put together an edit of Danish high-street brand *Only's* freshest pieces, including classic denim cuts, oversized shirts and wide-leg jumpsuits. We’re crushing on its striped co-ords and wrap dresses for our daytime vibe.

clothes.title: adidas Originals Locked Up logo track jacket in black
clothes.product_details:
**Jacket** by *adidas*

-   Stripe sleeves
-   Branded design
-   Zip fastening
-   Fitted trims
-   Regular fit

clothes.brand: With a brand history stretching back more than 60 years, *adidas* draws inspiration from street culture and retro styles to provide fresh, vintage-inspired collections. The *adidas Originals* range incorporates everything, from the brand's most iconic trainers to new jersey pieces.

clothes.brand: This is *ASOS DESIGN* – your go-to for all the latest trends, no matter who you are, where you’re from and what you’re up to. Exclusive to ASOS, our universal brand is here for you, and comes in all our fit ranges: ASOS Curve, Tall, Petite and Maternity. Created by us, styled by you.
